Class AlphaBetaPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • code.players.Player
      • code.players.AlphaBetaPlayer

  • public class AlphaBetaPlayer
extends Player
    alpha-beta pruning Player class for Konane game

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AlphaBetaPlayer(int depth, int pf)
      constructor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Move getMove(Board game)
      returns the best move based on the alpha beta algorithm
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getNodesExpandedPerTurn()
      returns an arraylist of the number of nodes expanded per turn, the number of entries is the same as the number of turns taken, and the sum of the entries is equal to the total number of nodes expanded
      int getNumNodesExpanded()
      returns the total number of nodes expanded by the algorithm up to the current move.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Long> getTimePerMove()
      returns an arraylist of time in ms.

             throws InvalidMoveException
        returns the best move based on the alpha beta algorithm

      • getNumNodesExpanded

        public int getNumNodesExpanded()
        returns the total number of nodes expanded by the algorithm up to the current move. Usually this is called after the game is over so as to return the total number of nodes expanded by the whole algorithm for the whole game.
        Specified by:
        getNumNodesExpanded in class Player
        Returns:
        the last sentence

      • getTimePerMove

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Long> getTimePerMove()
        returns an arraylist of time in ms. Each element corresponds to the time taken by the algorithm to pick the best move for each turn. The number of elements is the number of turns.
        Specified by:
        getTimePerMove in class Player
        Returns:
        the list of times taken per move

      • getNodesExpandedPerTurn

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getNodesExpandedPerTurn()
        returns an arraylist of the number of nodes expanded per turn, the number of entries is the same as the number of turns taken, and the sum of the entries is equal to the total number of nodes expanded
        Specified by:
        getNodesExpandedPerTurn in class Player
        Returns:
        the arraylist of number of nodes expanded per turn
